name: src/Vita/Vita.js

params.name: objDefaultReducerState
params.description:
Default reducer state to be
returned if attempting to reduce with a null or undefined state.

name: clearAllReducers
description: Clear all registered reducers for handling actions.

name: getDispatchable
description: Gets dispatchable Redux action object for a given action type.

params.name: strActionType
params.description:
Action type to generate dispatchable
object for.

params.name: varargsActionCreator
params.description:
Arguments to pass to the registered
function.

name: registerActionCreator
description: Create and register an action creator function.

name: registerReducer
description:
Register a reducer function to handle on receiving an action with a
given type.

params.name: strActionType
params.description:
Action type to invoke reducer function
on.

params.name: funcReducer
params.description:
Reducer function to invoke on reducing
action with type.

name: registerSlice
description:
Register an action creator and reducer function at the same time. Note
that the action creator param is optional. Omitting it will generate
a default action creator.

params.name: funcReducer
params.description:
Reducer function to invoke on reducing
action with type.

name: unregisterActionCreator
description: Unregister an action creator for a given action type.

params.name: strActionType
params.description:
Action type to unregister action creator
function for.

name: unregisterReducer
description: Unregister a reducer function for a given action type.

params.name: strActionType
params.description:
Action type to unregister handling reducer
function for.

name: unregisterSlice
description: Unregister an action creator and reducer at the same time.

name: src/Vita/index.js
content: export { default } from './Vita';

name: src/index.js
src/makeActionCreator/constants.js
content: export const KEY_TYPE = 'type';

name: src/makeActionCreator/index.js
content: export { default } from './makeActionCreator';

name: src/makeActionCreator/makeActionCreator.js

params.name: ufuncPropertyCreator
params.description:
Optional function to
generate additional properties to the action.

throws.description:
If action type is empty, or additional generated properties
were not a plain object.

name: src/reducerDecrementField/index.js
content: export { default } from './reducerDecrementField';

name: src/reducerDecrementField/reducerDecrementField.js
reducerDecrementField
description: Reducer function for decrementing a numeric field.

throws.description: If field is not a number.

name: src/reducerIncrementField/index.js
content: export { default } from './reducerIncrementField';

name: src/reducerIncrementField/reducerIncrementField.js
reducerIncrementField
description: Reducer function for incrementing a numeric field.

throws.description: If field is not a number.

name: src/reducerRemoveField/index.js
content: export { default } from './reducerRemoveField';

name: src/reducerRemoveField/reducerRemoveField.js
reducerRemoveField
description: Reducer function for removing a field.

name: src/reducerSetField/index.js
content: export { default } from './reducerSetField';

name: src/reducerSetField/reducerSetField.js
reducerSetField
description: Reducer function for setting a field.

name: src/reducerSetManyFields/index.js
content: export { default } from './reducerSetManyFields';

name: src/reducerSetManyFields/reducerSetManyFields.js
reducerSetManyFields
description: Reducer function for setting many fields.

name: src/reducerToggleBooleanField/index.js
content: export { default } from './reducerToggleBooleanField';

name: src/reducerToggleBooleanField/reducerToggleBooleanField.js
reducerToggleBooleanField
description: Reducer function for toggling a boolean field.

throws.description: If field is not a boolean.

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "redux-vita",
  "version": "1.3.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "./build/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "predoc": "del-cli \"./docs/**/*\"",
    "doc": "npm run predoc && esdoc",
    "prebuild": "npm run doc && del-cli \"./build/**/*\"",
    "build:es2015": "npm run prebuild && cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel ./src --ignore \"**/*.test.js\" --out-dir ./build",
    "lint": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint jest.config.js \"./src/**/*.js\" --color",
    "lint:fix": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint jest.config.js \"./src/**/*.js\" --color --fix",
    "precommit-message": "echo Executing pre-commit checks... && exit 0",
    "test": "jest"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/jsau-/redux-vita.git"
  },
  "author": "Jon Saunders",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE.md",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/jsau-/redux-vita/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/jsau-/redux-vita#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "7.4.4",
    "@babel/core": "7.4.5",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties": "7.4.4",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-decorators": "7.4.4",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-export-namespace-from": "7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-function-sent": "7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-json-strings": "7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-nullish-coalescing-operator": "7.4.4",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-numeric-separator": "7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-optional-chaining": "7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-throw-expressions": "7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-syntax-dynamic-import": "7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-syntax-import-meta": "7.2.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "7.4.5",
    "babel-eslint": "10.0.3",
    "babel-jest": "24.9.0",
    "cross-env": "5.2.0",
    "del-cli": "2.0.0",
    "esdoc": "1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "eslint": "6.6.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "14.0.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "5.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "2.19.1",
    "eslint-plugin-jsdoc": "8.4.4",
    "jest": "24.9.0",
    "lodash": "4.17.15",
    "pre-commit": "1.2.2",
    "redux": "4.0.0"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "lodash": "^4.17.15",
    "redux": "^4.0.0"
  },
  "pre-commit": [
    "precommit-message",
    "lint",
    "build:es2015",
    "test"
  ]
}
name: package.json
./README.md
